narrative:
No non-compliant items were identified during this announced pre-license inspection. 
This is a 1st Pre-license Inspection for a Class "C" license. This inspection and exit briefing were conducted with the 
applicant. The applicant is ready to be licensed under the AWA.  Conducting regulated activities without a valid USDA 
license is a violation of the Animal Welfare Act. 
A copy of your license will be sent to you without any additional action on your part. If you have not received your license 
within 30 days, please contact the USDA at 970-494-7478. 
 
End Section
